verses.verse: Therefore, <S%G3606><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of a heavenly <S%G2032><s%> calling, <S%G2821><s%> consider <S%G2657><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the Apostle <S%G652><s%> and High <S%G749><s%> Priest <S%G749><s%> of our confession. <S%G3671><s%>
He was faithful <S%G4103><s%> to Him who appointed <S%G4160><s%> Him, as Moses <S%G3475><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was in all <S%G3650><s%> His house. <S%G3624><s%>

For He has been counted <S%G515><s%> worthy <S%G515><s%> of more <S%G4183><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> by just <S%G2596><s%> so <S%G3745><s%> much <S%G3745><s%> as the builder <S%G2680><s%> of the house <S%G3624><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> than the house. <S%G3624><s%>
For every <S%G3956><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is built <S%G2680><s%> by someone, <S%G5100><s%> but the builder <S%G2680><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> is God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> was faithful <S%G4103><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> His house <S%G3624><s%> as a servant, <S%G2324><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> things which were to be spoken <S%G2980><s%> later;

but Christ <S%G5547><s%> [was faithful] as a Son <S%G5207><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> His house <S%G3624><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> we are, if <S%G1437><s%> we hold <S%G2722><s%> fast <S%G2722><s%> our confidence <S%G3954><s%> and the boast <S%G2745><s%> of our hope <S%G1680><s%> firm <S%G949><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> the end. <S%G5056><s%>
Therefore, <S%G1352><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Today <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> His voice, <S%G5456><s%>
Do not harden <S%G4645><s%> your hearts <S%G2588><s%> as when <S%G1722><s%> they provoked <S%G3894><s%> Me, As in the day <S%G2250><s%> of trial <S%G3986><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%>
Where <S%G3757><s%> your fathers <S%G3962><s%> tried <S%G3985><s%> [Me] by testing <S%G7047><s%> [Me], And saw <S%G3708><s%> My works <S%G2041><s%> for forty <S%G5065><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

"Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I was angry <S%G4360><s%> with this <S%G3778><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> And said, <S%G3004><s%> 'They always <S%G104><s%> go <S%G4105><s%> astray <S%G4105><s%> in their heart; <S%G2588><s%> And they did not know <S%G1097><s%> My ways <S%G3598><s%>';
As I swore <S%G3660><s%> in My wrath, <S%G3709><s%> 'They shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> My rest. <S%G2663><s%>'"

Take <S%G991><s%> care, <S%G991><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> there should be in any <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of you an evil, <S%G4190><s%> unbelieving <S%G570><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> in falling <S%G868><s%> away <S%G868><s%> from the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But encourage <S%G3870><s%> one <S%G1438><s%> another <S%G1438><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> as long <S%G891><s%> as it is [still] called <S%G2564><s%> "Today, <S%G4594><s%>" lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of you be hardened <S%G4645><s%> by the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>

For we have become <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> <S%G4007><s%> we hold <S%G2722><s%> fast <S%G2722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of our assurance <S%G5287><s%> firm <S%G949><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> the end; <S%G5056><s%>

while <S%G1722><s%> it is said, <S%G3004><s%> "Today <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> His voice, <S%G5456><s%> Do not harden <S%G4645><s%> your hearts, <S%G2588><s%> as when <S%G1722><s%> they provoked <S%G3894><s%> Me."

For who <S%G5101><s%> provoked <S%G3893><s%> [Him] when they had heard <S%G191><s%>? Indeed, <S%G235><s%> did not all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of Egypt <S%G125><s%> [led] by Moses <S%G3475><s%>?

And with whom <S%G5101><s%> was He angry <S%G4360><s%> for forty <S%G5065><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>? Was it not with those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> sinned, <S%G264><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> bodies <S%G2966><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>?
And to whom <S%G5101><s%> did He swear <S%G3660><s%> that they should not enter <S%G1525><s%> His rest, <S%G2663><s%> but to those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> were disobedient <S%G544><s%>?
And [so] we see <S%G991><s%> that they were not able <S%G1410><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of unbelief. <S%G570><s%>
